console log key-value pair.description: Display the logging information in key value pair

console table.description: Displays tabular data as a table

console assert.description: Writes an error message to the console if the expression is false

console count.description: Keep count of how many times your code is read

console dir.description: Display all the properties of an object

console group.description: Creates a new inline group in the Web Console

console groupEnd.description: Exits the current inline group in the Web Console

console info.description: Outputs an informational message with a icon

console time.description: Starts a timer you can use to track how long an operation takes

console timeEnd.description: Stops a timer that was previously started

console timeLog.description: Logs the current value of a timer that was previously started

console trace.description: Display the trace which represents how the code ended up at a certain point
